verses.verse: Now Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up from the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Nebo, <S%H5015><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of Pisgah, <S%H6449><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is opposite <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Jericho. <S%H3405><s%> And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> showed <S%H7200><s%> him all <S%H3605><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Dan, <S%H1835><s%>

and all <S%H3605><s%> Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the western <S%H314><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%>

and the Negev <S%H5045><s%> and the plain <S%H3603><s%> in the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of palm <S%H8558><s%> trees, <S%H8558><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Zoar. <S%H6820><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "This <S%H2088><s%> is the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'I will give <S%H5414><s%> it to your descendants <S%H2233><s%>'; I have let you see <S%H7200><s%> [it] with your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> but you shall not go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the word <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And He buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the valley <S%H1516><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> opposite <S%H4136><s%> Beth-peor; but no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> his burial <S%H6900><s%> place <S%H6900><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Although Moses <S%H4872><s%> was one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he died, <S%H4194><s%> his eye <S%H5869><s%> was not dim, <S%H3543><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> his vigor <S%H3893><s%> abated. <S%H5127><s%>

So the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> then the days <S%H3117><s%> of weeping <S%H1065><s%> [and] mourning <S%H60><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> came <S%H8552><s%> to an end. <S%H8552><s%>

Now Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> was filled <S%H4392><s%> with the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> had laid <S%H5564><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> on him; and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to him and did <S%H6213><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Since <S%H5750><s%> then <S%H5750><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> has risen <S%H6965><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> like Moses, <S%H4872><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to face, <S%H6440><s%>

for all <S%H3605><s%> the signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> him to perform <S%H6213><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> against Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his land, <S%H776><s%>

and for all <S%H3605><s%> the mighty <S%H2389><s%> power <S%H3027><s%> and for all <S%H3605><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> terror <S%H4172><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> performed <S%H6213><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
